allantoin.name: ALLANTOIN
allantoin.pros: A chemical that encourages cell turnover and soothes, decreases skin flaking and itching
allantoin.cons: Burning, stinging, redness, or irritation may occur if not used properly

hyaluronicacid.name: HYALURONIC ACID
hyaluronicacid.pros: Replenishs moisture and revitalizes skin's outer layers
hyaluronicacid.cons: Might cause skin to blister or appear discolored (a rare side effect)
